Point Events

A Point can host functions for events such as mousemove

Requirements

Actions apply through the dragging component. Ensure its imported: 


                <script src="point_src/functions/clamp.js"></script>
                <script src="point_src/distances.js"></script>
                <script src="point_src/dragging.js"></script>

Usage

Methods

Hookable actions for a Point:

  • onClick
  • onMousedown
  • onMousemove
  • onMouseup
  • onDragStart
  • onDragMove
  • onDragEnd
  • onLongClick
  • onWheel
